milestone.title: Stability & Performance (pre-release)
milestone.description: Critical fixes before the next public release

issues.title: [Bug] Search tab crashes intermittently when opening
issues.body: Observed a red-screen when opening the Search tab in recent test videos. Investigate provider access patterns in search_widget.dart; ensure callbacks use context.read and rebuilds are scoped with Selector. Capture logs and DevTools traces; add a regression test if possible.

issues.title: [Perf] Eliminate startup freeze by enforcing full lazy-loading
issues.body: Ensure metas-only startup and no Verse instances pre-first-surah. Validate with DevTools Memory snapshot (0 Verse at cold start). Audit repository/provider methods for any eager loads. Add a small integration test to assert verse count remains zero until a surah is opened.

issues.title: [UX] Auto-scroll during audio playback
issues.body: Couple auto-scroll to audio position or highlighted word index. Periodically verify the active verse is visible and scroll into view if not. Add a switch to disable for user preference.

issues.title: [Bug] Translation disappears after toggling display options
issues.body: Verify notifyListeners is called on display settings changes and state is updated immutably. Trace propagation from AppStateProvider to QuranViewWidget to VerseWidget. Add a minimal repro and widget test.

issues.title: [UX] Fix font encoding for ë/ç in Help titles
issues.body: Ensure font with Latin Extended coverage is used for Help titles (e.g., Lora/Noto). Update ThemeData accordingly and verify.

issues.title: [Perf] Reduce rebuild storms with Selector and const
issues.body: Audit heavy UI trees. Replace broad Consumers with targeted Selectors; add const constructors; avoid state changes in build. Document hotspots in the code and add guidance.

issues.title: [Perf] Defer search index initialization until Search tab is opened
issues.body: Fully defer search index ensure/build until the user interacts with the Search tab (open or first non-empty query). Remove any startup-time ensure calls. Validate with DevTools that no index parsing/build happens before Search is used, and verify cold start skipped frames drop. Add a small integration test that asserts index manager is not built on app start.
